attributes.action: Honour Michael Eavis for a contribution to music/culture/peace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Glastonbury (if you've been unlucky enough to have not attended yet), continues to have a long term impact on the people of the world. The emphasis continues to be on peace, freedom, liberty, equality, and integration; therefore having great meaning in the modern world. We should therefore support Mr Eavis in his work by honouring his contribution to people being able to change the world for the better.
